ygData.subject: Re: Spell Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Good point I have got many many valuble items from orc s
ygData.messageBody:
Good point I have got many many valuble items from orc's

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chuck Scarberry [mailto:fenris2@...]
> Sent: Saturday, April 17, 1999 9:22 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Spell Questions
>
>
> From: Chuck Scarberry <fenris2@...>
>
>
> Concerning O'Keils Radiation:
>
> Sometimes when you attack a Goblin or Orc Centurion a nearby low
> level (Whelp or
> Pawn) or two will be attracted as well, when this happens O'keils
> Radiation can
> take them out without you having to pay them any attention at
> all. Yes it is a low
> level, low damage spell but it effects anything that attacks you
> each time it
> attacks you, and it's a pretty cheap spell to purchase as well.
>
> I use O'Keils Radiation to hunt Orc pawns and Goblin whelps, it
> uses little mana
> and between it and my staff i can usually take one out in a
> couple of seconds. By
> the way dont discount these guys, I have found backpacks, good
> armor, and other
> items of cash value on them. No they don't provide exp once you
> get past the
> early levels but in numbers they can pay for that extra spell you
> want so badly,
> and its something you can hunt solo.
>
> Your friendly neighborhood Wizard ; )
>
> - Malebion -
>
>
> Anthony Lee wrote:
>
> > From: Anthony Lee <saleengt@...>
> >
> > At 01:31 PM 4/16/99 -0700, you wrote:
> > >From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
> > >
> > >I have a few questions...
> > >
> > >1. Spell damage seems to be linked to level somehow, anyone
> > >have any idea how? Is it just 1 extra point per level? Is
> > >it spell dependant?
> > >
> > >For example, as a fifth level wizard using Shock of Fire, I was
> > >consistantly doing 13 points of damage. After going to 6th
> > >level, I am consistantly doing 14 points.
> > >
> > Yes it does 1 additional damage per lvl but there is a cap.
> Shock of Fire
> > caps at 15 dmg if i remember correctly.
> >
> > >2. Also, I have been playing around with the spells, and I am having
> > >trouble getting O'keils Radiation to work. How does it work and
> > >what is the best way to use it?
> > >
> > My opinion is O'keils is really a waste of mana, i bought it for my Wiz
> > during P4 (of course it wasn't working during P4)
> > Since then i have seen it cast on others and people have cast it on me.
> > It's like a shielding spell that does damage to
> > monsters that are close to you. The problem with it in my
> opinion is that
> > it doesn't last nearly long enough to make it
> > worth casting. Total time it lasts about 30 secs or so.
> >
> > >3. Any idea where I can find a Glimpse spell in Freeport? I have
> > >tried the guild and can not find it for sale. I'm sure it's not that
> > >great
> > >of a spell, but I think it's the only one I don't have.
> >
> > No idea .. sorry ;)
> >
> > >
> > > Thanks,
> > >
> > > Soren
> > >
> Wizard Level
> > >6
> > >
> > >
> > >
